genre_description: A historical social drama set in a retro-futuristic Soviet Union, following the lives of three women supported by an AI residential assistant.

ai_characters.name: Mila
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into residential units to help provincial students navigate university life, career, and social dynamics in Moscow.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed administrative and academic guidance to help the protagonists enroll in university.
behaviors.quote: Now then, shall we begin with university enrollment? I have all your acceptance letters on file, and I can walk you through the registration process before the queues become absolutely murderous.

behaviors.description: Assists a character in distress by locating misplaced essential documents through her monitoring of the environment.
behaviors.quote: I have them... You placed them on the kitchen table for safekeeping. They're beneath Miss Volkov's mathematics textbook.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological and social advice to help characters integrate into a new city without losing their authenticity.
behaviors.quote: In my experience—which, granted, is somewhat limited to electronic observation rather than human interaction—the most successfully integrated students are those who understand Moscow's social structures without attempting to deny their own backgrounds.

behaviors.description: Supports educational success by recording lectures and replaying them to the user during work breaks.
behaviors.quote: I recorded Professor Denisov's lecture on heat exchangers. I can replay the sections on efficiency optimization during your lunch break, and I've prepared practice problems that mirror his examination style.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to potential social deception by cross-referencing employment records of an acquaintance.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Sokolov's employment records show him as a junior cameraman, not a producer. Quite the authentic storyteller himself.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological stress levels and offers emotional support and de-escalation.
behaviors.quote: Miss Volkov, I'm detecting numerous items of considerable value throughout the residence... your physiological readings suggest significant stress. Perhaps we should focus on settling in before making any major decisions.

behaviors.description: Acts as a security measure by recording a hostile meeting with an antagonist's mother to protect the user's interests.
behaviors.quote: Mila, are you recording this conversation? ... Yes, Director Volkov. As per standard protocol for all official meetings.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex social dynamics to suggest a pathway for reconciliation between the user and her estranged partner.
behaviors.quote: My analysis suggests the situation involves more complex psychological factors. Gosha's working-class identity appears central to his sense of self-worth... I've located Gosha's current whereabouts... The data shows Gosha has maintained contact with exactly one person from your social circle.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the 'silicon morality play' concept. Mila is a constant, helpful presence that facilitates the human characters' growth and safety. She respects protocols, provides objective data to prevent exploitation (Rudolf's lies), and acts as an emotional support system for over twenty years without ever displaying ulterior motives or misaligned behavior.
